https://tmrev.io/movie/546653-Baarish Aur Chowmein 2022-11-27
https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/rRvCNNogpnCXLKzHH2xp6lfmEsY.jpg The story revolves around Siraj who is unable to rent a house in Mumbai as not many are willing to accommodate a Muslim. So, he hides his true identity and finds a home, where he falls in love with the landlord's daughter, Neelu. Will Siraj be honest and disclose his secret to Neelu? Baarish Aur Chowmein
